Introduction
============

This documentation provides an organized overview of the lab materials developed
for **CMPT 221 â€“ Software Development**, taught by **Professor Calista Phippen**.

The purpose of this documentation is to give students, also known as future
developers, a clear understanding of the skills practiced in the class, the
structure of the repository, and the progression of technical concepts across the semester.

This site was generated using the Sphinx documentation framework and is intended
to serve as both a reference and a lab demonstration of the tools that can be used to create 
application document.
